name: The Other Me (Maecetea)
description:
The Other Me is a small Adventure 2D Game where you play Clarke and Griffin, orphan twins, that are trying to escape a lab.

In this mini adventure game, you have to fight and open the doors in order to advance through the levels. 

A story to discover, so do not wait to play!

This game is only playable with the mouse and keyboard.

CONTROLS :

 - LEFT CLICK to SWITCH. 

 - WASD or ARROW KEYS to MOVE. 

 -  E to ATTACK with Griffin or to OPEN THE DOORS with Clarke. 

TOOLS USED :

 - Unity (2021.3.5f1 Version)

 - Krita

 - Photoshop

- Indesign

- Aseprite

 - GarageBand

DEVELOPER :

Maëlys EDERN itch.io

This game  was made for Fam Jam 5.
